bibl.title: ÉAntif€lhsiw – Studies on Classical, Byzantine and Modern Greek Literature and Culture in Honour of John-Theophanes A. Papademetriou
bibl.note: Provenance unknown (acquired through the Papyrus-Kartell in 1914), fourth century A.D. The text (recto and verso) perhaps refers to a statue of Isis.
KALTSAS Demokritos, A Literary Papyrus from the University of Heidelberg Collection: Unidentified Postclassical Prose (P. Heid. Inv. G 1659).

Eleni KARAMALENGOU and Eugenia D. MAKRYGIANNI (Edd.), ÉAntif€lhsiw. Studies on Classical, Byzantine and Modern Greek Literature and Culture in Honour of John-Theophanes A. Papademetriou (Stuttgart, 2009) pp. 481-485, 2 figg. <antiphilesis>
